[Assert](./suspenders.assert.md)

The base assertion function signature.

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

</td><td>

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[TypeAssert](./suspenders.typeassert.md)


</td><td>

Builds an assertion function from a runtime predicate.

When the predicate returns `false`<!-- -->, it throws a `TypeError` (or a custom message).


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[TypePredicate](./suspenders.typepredicate.md)


</td><td>

A type predicate function signature (`value is TOut`<!-- -->).
